mapper.select: SELECT lhlxtjb.tjrq,sum(lhlxtjb.jjsl)as jjsl,lhlxdmb.lhlxmc as lhlxdm FROM REC_LHLXTJB lhlxtjb LEFT JOIN DICT_LHLXDMB lhlxdmb ON lhlxtjb.lhlxdm=lhlxdmb.lhlxdm WHERE tjrq=#{tjTime} group by lhlxtjb.lhlxdm,lhlxtjb.tjrq,lhlxdmb.lhlxmc

SELECT sum(lhlxtjb.jjsl)as jjsl ,lhlxtjb.tjrq,lhlxdmb.lhlxmc as lhlxdm FROM REC_LHLXTJB lhlxtjb LEFT JOIN DICT_LHLXDMB lhlxdmb ON lhlxtjb.lhlxdm=lhlxdmb.lhlxdm WHERE tjrq between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by lhlxtjb.lhlxdm ,lhlxtjb.tjrq,lhlxdmb.lhlxmc ORDER BY lhlxtjb.tjrq asc

SELECT xzqh.xzqhmc AS xzqhdm, sum(lhlxtjb.jjsl)as jjsl ,lhlxtjb.tjrq,lhlxdmb.lhlxmc as lhlxdm FROM REC_LHLXTJB lhlxtjb LEFT JOIN DICT_LHLXDMB lhlxdmb ON lhlxtjb.lhlxdm=lhlxdmb.lhlxdm LEFT JOIN DICT_XZQHB xzqh ON SUBSTR(xzqh.xzqhdm,1, 4)=lhlxtjb.xzqhdm WHERE tjrq between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by lhlxtjb.lhlxdm ,lhlxtjb.tjrq,lhlxdmb.lhlxmc,xzqh.xzqhmc ORDER BY lhlxtjb.tjrq asc

SELECT xzqh.xzqhmc AS xzqhdm,lhlxtjb.jjsl AS jjsl ,lhlxtjb.tjrq,lhlxdmb.lhlxmc as lhlxdm FROM REC_LHLXTJB lhlxtjb LEFT JOIN DICT_LHLXDMB lhlxdmb ON lhlxtjb.lhlxdm=lhlxdmb.lhlxdm LEFT JOIN DICT_XZQHB xzqh ON SUBSTR(xzqh.xzqhdm,1, 4)=lhlxtjb.xzqhdm WHERE tjrq between #{startTime} and #{endTime} AND lhlxtjb.xzqhdm=#{xzqhdm} ORDER BY lhlxtjb.tjrq asc
